title: Query Enhancement Roadmap and Prerequisites for v0.9.1
body: QUERY ENHANCEMENT STATUS: ⚠️ PLANNED FOR v0.9.1 - Prerequisites identified, implementation plan defined. CURRENT QUERY CAPABILITIES: Basic query methods operational (instructions/get, instructions/list, instructions/listScoped with workspace/user/team filtering), client/workspace properties available in schema (sourceWorkspace, createdByAgent, workspaceId, userId, teamIds). MISSING PREREQUISITES FOR v0.9.1: 1) Secondary indexing infrastructure (byCategory, byCreatedByAgent, bySourceWorkspace maps) - NOT in current IMPLEMENTATION-PLAN.md, 2) Query planner service with intersection-based filtering and smallest-set-first optimization, 3) instructions/search API with full parameter set (ids[], categoryIncludes[], priorityTier, client/workspace filters, pagination), 4) Enhanced error handling (JSON-RPC -32602/-32603), 5) Performance optimization for O(k) result-size queries. IMPLEMENTATION GAP: Current IMPLEMENTATION-PLAN.md focuses on usage tracking phases (temporal windowing, hotness scoring) which differ from query enhancement requirements specified in PRD.md and PROJECT-PRD.md. RECOMMENDATION: Update current plan or create separate QUERY-ENHANCEMENT-PLAN.md before starting v0.9.1 development. Estimated effort: ~2-3 weeks for complete secondary indexing and search API implementation.
